DCMovies.title: Superman
DCMovies.description: The story of Clark Kent, a man from another planet with extraordinary powers who becomes Superman to protect humanity.

DCMovies.title: Superman II
DCMovies.description: Superman faces his toughest challenge yet as he goes up against powerful Kryptonian foes who threaten Earth.

DCMovies.title: Batman
DCMovies.description: Bruce Wayne takes up the mantle of Batman to fight crime in Gotham City, facing villains and his own dark past.

DCMovies.title: Batman Returns
DCMovies.description: Batman battles against the sinister Penguin and the mysterious Catwoman as they terrorize Gotham City.

DCMovies.title: Batman Begins
DCMovies.description: The origins of Bruce Wayne’s transformation into Batman as he begins his journey to bring justice to Gotham.

DCMovies.title: The Dark Knight
DCMovies.description: Batman faces his greatest enemy, the Joker, who plunges Gotham into chaos and tests Batman’s resolve.

DCMovies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
DCMovies.description: Batman returns from exile to confront the merciless Bane, who threatens to destroy Gotham.

DCMovies.title: Green Lantern
DCMovies.description: Test pilot Hal Jordan gains superpowers and becomes the Green Lantern to protect Earth and the universe.

DCMovies.title: Constantine
DCMovies.description: Demon hunter John Constantine fights dark forces from hell in this supernatural battle for humanity's fate.

DCMovies.title: Watchmen
DCMovies.description: A group of former superheroes is forced out of retirement to investigate the murder of one of their own.

DCMovies.title: Man of Steel
DCMovies.description: Clark Kent discovers his alien origin and rises as Superman to protect humanity from an impending threat.

DCMovies.title: Batman vs Superman
DCMovies.description: The epic showdown between Superman and Batman, as they grapple with each other's ideals of justice.

DCMovies.title: Suicide Squad
DCMovies.description: A team of imprisoned supervillains is recruited for dangerous missions by the government in exchange for reduced sentences.

DCMovies.title: Wonder Woman
DCMovies.description: Amazonian princess Diana ventures into the world of men to stop Ares, the god of war, and bring peace.

DCMovies.title: Aquaman
DCMovies.description: Arthur Curry, a half-human, half-Atlantean, embarks on a journey to claim his rightful throne in Atlantis.

DCMovies.title: Shazam
DCMovies.description: Teenager Billy Batson gains the ability to transform into an adult superhero with powers by saying 'Shazam!'

DCMovies.title: Wonder Woman 1984
DCMovies.description: Wonder Woman faces new foes in the 1980s, including the powerful Cheetah and the ambitious Maxwell Lord.

DCMovies.title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
DCMovies.description: Superheroes unite under Batman and Wonder Woman’s leadership to face the cosmic threat of Steppenwolf.

DCMovies.title: The Suicide Squad
DCMovies.description: An unlikely team of villains undertakes a deadly mission on the island of Corto Maltese to save the world.

DCMovies.title: The Batman
DCMovies.description: Batman faces off against the mysterious Riddler in a gritty reimagining of the hero’s early days in Gotham.

DCMovies.title: Black Adam
DCMovies.description: Teth-Adam rises from slavery to become the powerful Black Adam, challenging the world and heroism itself.

DCMovies.title: Shazam Fury of the Gods
DCMovies.description: Shazam and his siblings must fight the Daughters of Atlas to protect their world and their family.

DCMovies.title: The Flash
DCMovies.description: Barry Allen, the fastest man alive, races through time to fix his past and save his loved ones.

DCMovies.title: Blue Beetle
DCMovies.description: Jaime Reyes discovers an alien scarab that grants him extraordinary powers, becoming the hero Blue Beetle.

DCMovies.title: Aquaman & The Lost Kingdom
DCMovies.description: Aquaman must protect his kingdom from new threats, forging alliances to prevent a devastating war.

DCMovies.title: Joker
DCMovies.description: The origin story of the Joker, a man rejected by society who spirals into madness and chaos in Gotham.

DCMovies.title: Joker Folie à Deux
DCMovies.description: The next chapter in the Joker’s story unfolds as he forms a twisted bond with an unlikely ally.
